title: Reference Point via Python
content: Is there any way to set the position of the Reference Point via Python? I checked the [Unofficial FontLab 4.5 Python reference](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081255/http:/www.e-font.de/flpydoc/), but found no reference to the Reference Point. Nothing on the RoboFab site either.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: Never mind. I can accomplish the same thing with a move after a transformation relative to the zero point.
